mapper.select: SELECT B.RN, B.FNO, B.WRITER, B.CONTENT, B.IP, B.HIT, B.CREATED, B.LASTMODIFIED, B.STATE, B.DEPTH, B.GROUPNO, B.GROUPORD FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.FNO, A.WRITER, A.CONTENT, A.IP, A.HIT, A.CREATED, A.LASTMODIFIED, A.STATE, A.DEPTH, A.GROUPNO, A.GROUPORD FROM (SELECT FNO, WRITER, CONTENT, IP, HIT, CREATED, LASTMODIFIED, STATE, DEPTH, GROUPNO, GROUPORD FROM FREE ORDER BY FNO DESC) A ) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} and #{endRecord}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE VALUES( FREE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{content}, #{ip}, 0, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0, 0, FREE_SEQ.CURRVAL, 0 )
